summary:
Tony: I hate him.
Peter: Me too.
Tony: You have no idea who I’m talking about.
Peter: Solidarity, sister.

summary: The Time Peter Faced America (And Elsa)
title: The Time Peter Faced America (And Elsa)
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2DGPrPF

by Supernaturalislifeforyouandme

Peter just slid by with Steve not finding out that he lived in the Tower. But how will he talk himself out of this situation when he is caught by Captain America and the Winter Soldier?

Please read Part One if you have not, it’ll make a little more sense.

Words: 1589, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

blog.name: the-kitteh

blog.description: Anna at her very best & her very worst.

summary: It’s been far too long since I’ve managed to sit and draw and enjoy it. It only makes sense that I came back with a bang!  Soft...
caption:
It’s been far too long since I’ve managed to sit and draw and enjoy it. It only makes sense that I came back with a bang! 

Soft WinterIron Warm WinterIron, Little ball of angst, 

happy WinterIron, sleepy WinterIron, stab stab stab.

much much love and gratitude to all the wonderful babies over at the WI discord, without who I’d never find the courage or the energy to draw <3

reblog.comment:

happy WinterIron, sleepy WinterIron, stab stab stab.

much much love and gratitude to all the wonderful babies over at the WI discord, without who I’d never find the courage or the energy to draw <3

It’s been far too long since I’ve managed to sit and draw and enjoy it. It only makes sense that I came back with a bang!

happy WinterIron, sleepy WinterIron, stab stab stab.

much much love and gratitude to all the wonderful babies over at the WI discord, without who I’d never find the courage or the energy to draw <3

tags: look college ironhusbands is god tier and you can fight me on that
theyre in love. happy. and adorable and thats the tea
summary: tony gets a concussion in college once and rhodey never forgets it bc tony kept hanging all over him and complaining about his...
body: tony gets a concussion in college once and rhodey never forgets it bc tony kept hanging all over him and complaining about his head but whenever he was half asleep the concussion brain time would hit and tony would squeeze rhodey’s hand and tell him how much he loves him. (also tony looked really cute in his too big mit sweater and rhodey’s sunglasses)

summary: I imagine it's pretty fucking hard to make Tony angry but like...just picture the angry sex then. Maybe he's jealous or...
question: I imagine it's pretty fucking hard to make Tony angry but like...just picture the angry sex then. Maybe he's jealous or something....
answer:
jeasLoUs sex would be lit but TONY BEING JEALOUS OOOOOOF

Tony fakes being angry a lot to mess with you. He’ll give you an angry look then pounce on you and start tickling you. But one day you’re flirting with another team member and they’re flirting back and Tony is NOT having it. He’d drag you to the bedroom and fuck you until you were screaming his name so that prick knew who you belonged ti

title: The River Between Us
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2DJJLUW

by BeaArthurPendragon

After losing his powers to a bioweapon designed by an anti-mutant terrorist named Hominus (noncanonical villain), Matt Murdock asks his boyfriend Peter Parker for a three-month trial separation so he can get used to his new life by himself. Peter doesn’t take it very well.

Words: 10202, Chapters: 3/7, Language: English

Series: Part 2 of The Devil’s Afterlife

  • Fandoms: Daredevil (TV), Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017), The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Defenders (Marvel TV), Deadpool - All Media Types
  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: Major Character Death, No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Peter Parker, Wade Wilson, May Parker (Spider-Man), Karen Page, Matt Murdock, Happy Hogan, Tony Stark, Mary Jane Watson, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Gwen Stacy
  • Relationships: Matt Murdock/Peter Parker, Peter Parker/Wade Wilson, Matt Murdock & Peter Parker, Peter Parker & Wade Wilson
  • Additional Tags: Fluff, Angst, Smut, Hurt/Comfort, Emotional Hurt/Comfort, LGBTQ Character, Heartbreak, Guilt, Matt Murdock Needs a Hug, Peter Parker Needs a Hug, Wade Wilson Is Giving Away Free Hugs, Disability, Judaism, Adult Peter Parker, Headcanon, Jewish Headcanons, Jewish Character, Jewish Holidays, Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder - PTSD, Nightmares, So much guilt, Sorry I Killed Off Most of The Defenders, Spideypool - Freeform, spideydevil, Jewish Peter Parker, spider-devil

blog.name: winterironholidayexchange
blog.title: Winteriron Holiday Exchange
blog.description: The official WinterIron Holiday Exchange page.

summary:
Welcome to the 2018 WinterIron Holiday Exchange! You
 like 
Tony Stark and Bucky Barnes? You desperately need a distraction...
body:
Welcome to the 2018 WinterIron Holiday Exchange!

You like Tony Stark and Bucky Barnes? You desperately need a distraction because you’re still not over Infinity War? Sign up for the WinterIron Holiday Exchange, and make them hug it out!

Information:

  • Sign-ups are open from October 1st to October 14th. If you want to participate, all you need is an AO3 account, and to fill out this AO3 form.

  • The minimum amount of people required for the exchange to take place is 20, so share this post (even if you don’t want to participate yourself), and let your followers know. Spread the WinterIron love!

  • There will be a mandatory email check-in.

  • All finished works will have to be published to our AO3 collection by December 31st at the latest.

  • If you want to sign up as a beta to assist people with their gifts, simply send us an Ask or an email.

  • If you want to sign up as a pinch hitter, go and fill out this form.

  • For more information, check out our tumblr.

Please make sure to read the info page before signing up. If you have questions, suggestions, or concerns, don’t hesitate to contact us.

Tumblr: Ask
Email: winterironinfo@gmx.ch

summary:
[Post Infinity War, everyone gathers around Tony]
Stranger: What's going on? Who is that? 
Steve: [smiles] My hero.
body:
[Post Infinity War, everyone gathers around Tony]

Stranger: What’s going on? Who is that?

Steve: [smiles] My hero.

summary: Tony when Steve asks him out for the first time: He’s probably just humouring me Tony when he’s getting fucked by Steve: He...
body:
Tony when Steve asks him out for the first time: He’s probably just humouring me

Tony when he’s getting fucked by Steve: He probably still thinks we’re just friends

Tony when Steve proposes: He’s probably just kidding

Tony, marrying Steve, crying: Oh fuck. He’s not kidding.

tony single-handedly pacified hulk and then paid outta pocket to help the city afterward
summary: Tony Stark showing care and consideration for the city of Johannesburg, South Africa, while trying to subdue the Hulk. Tony’s...
caption:
Tony Stark showing care and consideration for the city of Johannesburg, South Africa, while trying to subdue the Hulk. Tony’s primary concern is mitigating loss of life and damage; afterward, he personally funds the recovery effort.

+ Bonus:
